pkgmetadata.longdescription: Libraries and tools for the NeXus data format, developed collaboratively by scientists from major scientific facilities to facilitate analysis and visualisation of neutron, x-ray and muon data. NeXus is based on HDF5.

use.flag: Allow using the verbose XML representation of NeXus data
